title: Black & Decker The Complete Guide to Plumbing + Working With
description:
Black & Decker The Complete Guide to Plumbing, Updated 5th Edition: Faucets & Fixtures - PEX - Tubs & Toilets - Water Heaters - Troubleshooting & Repair - Much More (Black & Decker Complete Guide)

From fixing a faucet to installing a drain line in a basement floor, this massive volume has the answer to any home plumbing problem youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re likely to find. Packed with clear color photos and easy-to-understand descriptions, the first four editions of this bestselling book have combined for more than 700,000 books sold. The basics of home plumbing systems are explained with clarity, and all of the most popular plumbing projects are shown with beautiful step-by-step photos. New information in this edition includes how to winterize a house and how to install a state-of-the-art, on-demand water heater.
